name: DomoDashboard
description: This Test Connection validates the access against the server and basic metadata extraction of dashboards and charts.

steps.name: GetDashboards
steps.description: List all the dashboards available to the user
steps.errorMessage: Failed to fetch dashboards, please validate the credentials or validate if user has access to fetch dashboards

steps.name: GetCharts
steps.description: We can get the chart information using the Access Token and the Instance Domain.
steps.errorMessage: Failed to fetch chart information. Please make sure that the Access Token used has enough permissions to get chart details.
